title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

trailer.description: Hogwarts is no longer safe in this darker sequel trailer

summary: Harry's second year begins with a dire warning from a strange house-elf named Dobby, who predicts disaster if Harry returns to Hogwarts. Ignoring the warning (and escaping the Dursleys in a flying Ford Anglia with Ron), Harry arrives to find sinister messages written in blood on the castle walls: 'The Chamber of Secrets has been opened.' As students are petrified by an unseen monster, Harry discovers he can hear a haunting voice in the walls - a voice no one else can hear. Teaming up with Ron and Hermione (now armed with encyclopedic knowledge of magical creatures), they follow clues pointing to Salazar Slytherin's legendary Basilisk - a giant serpent whose gaze kills. The mystery deepens when Hermione is petrified, leaving behind a crucial hint, and Harry finds Tom Riddle's enchanted diary that reveals Hagrid's unjust expulsion 50 years prior. In a heart-pounding climax, Harry enters the Chamber itself, where he battles the Basilisk, destroys Riddle's diary (a magical Horcrux containing young Voldemort's memory), and rescues Ginny Weasley from the diary's life-draining possession. The year ends with Dobby freed by Harry's clever trick on Lucius Malfoy, proving that even the smallest creatures can change destiny.
